firemon_api.apps.securitymanager.license¶

class firemon_api.apps.securitymanager.license.License(api: FiremonAPI, app: App)¶

Bases: Endpoint

Represent actions on the License endpoint. Most of the other endpoint objects return some Record. It does not seem to fit here so just a plain dict for most things is being returned until I figure out better way.

Parameters:

  • api (obj) – FiremonAPI()

  • app (obj) – App()

all() → bool | dict | str | bytes¶

Get all Record

count() → None¶
Raises:

NotImplementedError –

ep_name = 'license'¶
filter() → None¶
Raises:

NotImplementedError –

get() → bool | dict | str | bytes¶

Get single Record

Parameters:

  • *args (int) – (optional) id to retrieve. If this is not type(int) dump it into filter and grind it up there.

  • **kwargs (str) – (optional) see filter() for available filters

Examples

Get by ID

>>> fm.sm.centralsyslogs.get(12)
new york

Get by partial name. Case insensative.

>>> fm.sm.centralsyslogs.get(name='detro')
detroit
load(lic: bytes) → bool | dict | str | bytes¶

Load license file

Parameters:

lic (bytes) – bytes that make a license file

Returns:

bool

Example

>>> fn = '/path/to/file/firemon.lic'
>>> with open(fn, 'rb') as f:
>>>     file = f.read()
>>> fm.sm.license.load(file)
url = None¶

FireMon-API is a Python web wrapper for the FireMon SIP (Security Mangager, etc...) APIs. The intent is make something that is useful for quick and easy development against FireMon products.
